about.

home about tour awards

Homeboy hails from the suburbs of eastern Wyoming. At the ripe age of 14 (in dog years), he was able to master the art of puppetry. It wasn't long before he fused his passion for puppetry with his love for jazz and death metal, creating an act that is beautifully unique and urges his audiences to question what it really means to be a dog in 2019. Can your dog use puppets? Doubtful. Can your dog use puppets as a vehicle to create genre defying music? Not a chance. Homeboy has established himself as a staple of the canine ventriloquism scene.
